name: 50 Shades
description: Hot challenges and very candid questions for couples who aren’t afraid to cross the line.

dares.title: Whisper of Passion
dares.action: ${c_player}, whisper to ${r_player} which touch you like the most.

dares.title: Minute of Revelation
dares.action: ${c_player}, share your boldest fantasy with ${r_player}.

dares.title: No Closer Than This
dares.action: ${c_player}, slowly move toward ${r_player} until there’s almost no space left between you, and freeze for 15 seconds.

dares.title: Forbidden Topic
dares.action: ${c_player}, ask ${r_player} the most candid question you’ve long wanted to ask.

dares.title: No Hands
dares.action: ${c_player}, touch ${r_player} with any part of your body except your hands.

dares.title: Secret Place
dares.action: ${c_player}, tell ${r_player} the most unusual place where you’d like to be alone with them.

dares.title: Eyes to Eyes
dares.action: ${c_player} and ${r_player}, silently look into each other’s eyes for 20 seconds, slowly moving closer.

dares.title: One Word
dares.action: ${c_player}, tell ${r_player} one word that gives you goosebumps.

dares.title: Confession in the Dark
dares.action: ${c_player}, close your eyes and make a very personal confession to ${r_player}.

dares.title: Limits of Permission
dares.action: ${c_player}, quietly tell ${r_player} what you’d agree to if you had only one night together.

dares.title: Draw a Desire
dares.action: ${c_player}, gently trace your secret desire on ${r_player}'s body with your finger.

dares.title: Breath of Closeness
dares.action: Bring your lips as close as possible without touching and stay like that for 15 seconds.

dares.title: Fantasy Out Loud
dares.action: ${c_player}, briefly tell ${r_player} what private scenario with them you think about most often.

dares.title: Game Rules
dares.action: ${c_player}, propose one "rule" for the next hour that ${r_player} must follow.

dares.title: Secret Gesture
dares.action: ${c_player}, show ${r_player} which gesture of theirs you find most arousing.

dares.title: Conversation Without Words
dares.action: Try to communicate your desire to each other using only facial expressions and eye contact.

dares.title: Personal Massage
dares.action: ${c_player}, give ${r_player} a sensual neck massage for 20 seconds.

dares.title: Nothing but the Truth
dares.action: ${c_player}, answer ${r_player}'s question as honestly as possible, no matter how candid it is.

dares.title: Dangerous Proximity
dares.action: ${c_player}, whisper in ${r_player}'s ear the most explicit phrase that comes to mind right now.

dares.title: Desire for Two
dares.action: On the count of three, say aloud your most intimate desire for each other.

dares.title: Forbidden Zone Kiss
dares.action: ${c_player}, gently kiss ${r_player} in any unexpected spot on their body.

dares.title: Blind Touch
dares.action: ${c_player}, with eyes closed, run your hand over ${r_player}'s body, stopping wherever you like.

dares.title: Minute of Passion
dares.action: Kiss for a full minute without breaking contact.

dares.title: Scent of Arousal
dares.action: ${c_player}, inhale the scent of ${r_player}'s skin at the neck and describe how it makes you feel.

dares.title: Secret Whisper
dares.action: ${c_player}, whisper in ${r_player}'s ear what you want to do with them right now.

dares.title: Close Contact
dares.action: ${c_player}, press your whole body against ${r_player} and stay like that for 15 seconds.

dares.title: Perfect Touch
dares.action: ${c_player}, gently run a finger over ${r_player}'s lips.

dares.title: Candid Massage
dares.action: ${c_player}, give ${r_player} a sensual shoulder and back massage for 30 seconds.

dares.title: Hot Breath
dares.action: ${c_player}, let your breath travel along ${r_player}'s neck, barely touching the skin.

dares.title: Without Words
dares.action: ${c_player}, show with a gesture or touch what you want from ${r_player} right now.

dares.title: Private Dance
dares.action: ${c_player}, perform a short, provocative dance for ${r_player}.

dares.title: Fantasy Out Loud (Detailed)
dares.action: ${c_player}, describe to ${r_player} in as much detail as possible your most intimate desire involving them.

dares.title: Sweet Bite
dares.action: ${c_player}, gently nibble ${r_player}'s earlobe or neck.

dares.title: Invitation to Intimacy
dares.action: ${c_player}, softly invite ${r_player} to be alone with you as seductively as possible.

dares.title: Absolute Trust
dares.action: ${c_player}, let ${r_player} touch any part of your body they choose.

dares.title: One Breath
dares.action: Kiss as if you're sharing a single breath.

dares.title: Desire by Hand
dares.action: ${c_player}, using your hands, indicate on ${r_player}'s body the spot you want to kiss right now.

dares.title: Breath Control
dares.action: ${c_player}, run your lips along ${r_player}'s collarbones while controlling their breathing.

dares.title: Eyes and Lips
dares.action: Alternate gazes and light lip kisses for 20 seconds.

dares.title: Forbidden Promise
dares.action: ${c_player}, whisper to ${r_player} the most explicit promise you're ready to fulfill today.
